name: Aeschines: Glimpse of Adulthood
description:
Aeschines: Glimpse of Adulthood is a visual novel that puts you in the sandals of a 4th century Athenian. Features include:

– 12 different endings.

– 4 variables that measure your relationships.

– Characters and stories drawn directly from 4th century Athens.

Prepare yourself for an ancient world involving pederasty, violence, and corruption. Your decisions will have consequences, and not every story will end well!

This game was produced some years ago as a hobby and is available for free. If you enjoy this title or are otherwise interested in Greek Antiquity, please check out our newest title:  Theseus: Journey to Athens
